snippet: In one of the largest hiring commitments for veterans in history, the company expects to employ 100,000 people.
abstract: Wal-Mart announces plan to hire every veteran who wants a job, provided that the veterans have left the military in the previous year and did not receive a dishonorable discharge; company expects historic hiring commitment will employ 100,000 people in the next five years.
lead_paragraph: In one of the largest hiring commitments for veterans in history, the company expects to employ 100,000 people.

headline.seo: Wal-Mart to Announce Extensive Plan to Hire Veterans
headline.main: Wal-Mart Plans to Hire Any Veteran Who Wants a Job
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart to Announce a Five-Year Commitment to Hire 100,000 Veterans

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
